6: He made a very long hoe handle.
7: He made very high door frames.
8: He made a very long bed.
9: He bought a very high bicycle.
10:
He sat on a very high chair.
He ate with a very long fork.
11:
He left his house and lived in a big forest.
He lived for many years.
